set(OPTIONAL_LITE_PROJECT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/optional-lite")

UpdateExternalLib("optional-lite" "https://github.com/martinmoene/optional-lite.git" "c94a958c188ac0befea23184977e159eb8512ff4")
